name: IMPULSE (Lord Pillows)
description:
made in free version of construct 2 for mini jam 24

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HOW TO PLAY

you just need to use the mouse left click, click on any direction and the character will be launched to the opposite way, and remenber that you have low gravity

NOTE: the game is propositally a bit hard, some people may need some practice to domain the controls

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

every level was tested and they are 100% possible

Good Luck and thanks for playing :D
